name: Strawberry Shortcut Cake
preparation: Place fresh strawberries in a Round or Multipurpose Steamer. Microwave on high for 2–3 min. Then, mash berries with a fork or Ground Meat Separator; set mashed berries aside.
Meanwhile, combine Greek yogurt and Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix in a bowl. Set bowl aside.
Place 1 biscuit half in each of 4 bowls; top each with sliced strawberries and 1⁄4 cup Greek yogurt mixture. Garnish each bowl with a mint leaf and halved strawberries, if desired. Enjoy!

products.name: Quick Biscuit Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Save money and make your own restaurant-quality biscuits right at home with this Quick Biscuit Mix! The perfect side to any soup, stew, or chili dish.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
